meanings.definition: Make or become united, uniform, or whole.
meanings.sent1: The team unified their efforts to win the game.
meanings.sent2: The countries unified to promote peace in the region.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces unified perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: Her speech unified the audience, inspiring them to take action.
meanings.sent5: The music unified the crowd, bringing everyone together in harmony.

meanings.definition: Formed or produced by the unification of elements.
meanings.sent1: The unified document contained all the necessary information.
meanings.sent2: The team's unified approach led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a unified flavor, blending perfectly with every bite.
meanings.sent4: The painting displayed a unified color scheme, creating a sense of balance.
meanings.sent5: The garden had a unified design, with each plant complementing the others.
